select sr.id,sr.reporter,sr.defendant,sr.content,sr.report_time,sr.artid,sr.status,sr.processing_mode,sr.result, sau_reporter.nick_name as reporterName,IFNULL(sau_defendant.nick_name,'平台') as defendantName,sa.content, sa.img_1,sa.img_2,sa.img_3,sa.img_4,sa.img_5,sa.img_6,sa.img_7,sa.img_8,sa.img_9,sa.video,sa.content as artContent from sys_report sr LEFT JOIN sys_app_user sau_reporter on sr.reporter=sau_reporter.id LEFT JOIN sys_app_user sau_defendant on sr.defendant=sau_defendant.id LEFT JOIN sys_article sa on sr.artid=sa.id where sr.id=#{id}
